text: Stephen Miller (born August 23, 1985) is an American activist and politician who has been the 12th United States Homeland Security Advisor since 2025. He was a senior advisor for policy for President Trump during his first administration. Before, he served as the communications director for then- Senator Jeff Sessions. He was also a press secretary to Republican Representatives Michele Bachmann and John Shadegg. As a speechwriter for Trump, Miller helped write Trump's inaugural address. On October 6, 2020, Miller tested positive for COVID-19. In November 2024, CNN reported that Miller would serve as Trump's deputy chief of staff for policy and United States Homeland Security Advisor in his second term. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Jewish American writers Category:American political writers Category:Writers from California Category:Politicians from California Category:People from Santa Monica, California Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
